Mandate: Deliver mobile and data services while securing networks from abuse and supporting national compliance efforts.
TopPriorities: Collaborate with security institutions to block SIM swaps used in money laundering.
Enable mobile money transaction tagging for suspicious payments.
Invest in rural connectivity to support remote audit teams.
ActiveOperations: Dedicated compliance liaison with Financial Intelligence Centre on high-volume transfers.
Network integrity team tracking unusual traffic patterns.
CSR programs funding community reporting hotlines for fraud.

RecentActions.Title: Enhanced network security measures
RecentActions.Summary: Deployed advanced systems to detect and block fraudulent activities.

RecentActions.Title: Rural connectivity expansion
RecentActions.Summary: Installed new infrastructure to support field agents and audit teams.
